byline.original: By JOSHUA BRUSTEIN and ERIC DASH
byline.contributor: David Jolly, Stephen Castle and Bettina Wassener contributed reporting.

snippet: Shares in every major sector spiraled downward on Monday amid anxiety over the European debt crisis and the struggling United States economy.
